definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: A female monkey gives birth to a little monkey in the vage of lab.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室的小籠中一隻母猴生下了小猴。

sentences.english: and they moved to America first, had my eldest sister.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們搬去了美國，生下了我的大姐姐。

sentences.english: Portman is expecting the couple's first child in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 波曼預計在2011年生下他們的第一胎。

sentences.english: On a snow coverd winter day, you gave birth to your first child.
sentences.chinese: 在冬季大雪紛飛的一天，您生下了第一個孩子。

sentences.english: They had a son together, my brother Josh.
sentences.chinese: 他們生下了一個兒子，我的弟弟喬希。

sentences.english: Yansha gave birth to nine great divinities.
A British hospital says a mother in Northern Irelandhas given birth to sextuplets.
sentences.chinese: 英國一家病院稱，一位北愛爾蘭婦女生下六胞胎。

sentences.english: I don't know my son is you.
sentences.chinese: 黃母我不知道生下的會是你。

sentences.english: They all told me that I would die. They begged me not to have a baby.
sentences.chinese: 他們所有人都求我別生下這個孩子，說我會因此送命。

sentences.english: Next she bears his brother Abel.
sentences.chinese: 後來她生下了他的弟弟亞伯。

sentences.english: That night Mary gave birth to this very special boy.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上瑪麗生下了這個特別的男孩。

sentences.english: I had just given birth to my first child and was at least fifty pounds overweight.
sentences.chinese: 我剛生下我的第一個孩子，並至少五十磅超重。

sentences.english: Mothers give birth to a single infant, which she cares for until the age of two.
sentences.chinese: 當母猩猩生下小幼崽時會照顧它至兩歲。

sentences.english: So they’ll produce more sons of their own.
sentences.chinese: 那麼他們就會生下更多男孩。

sentences.english: During that time, Mrs. Levine gave birth to 4 children.
sentences.chinese: 在這期間，萊文夫人生下了四個孩子。

sentences.english: How want to get she bears of that carve is also the Han son dent Jie to draw final expiration of does that engrave?
sentences.chinese: 如何想得到她生下的那刻也就是菡兒力竭氣絕的那刻？

definition: to be the parent of (a child)
to be born/arrival of newborn/birth (of a savior or religious leader)
to give birth to a child or children
to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
to bear/to give birth/to grow/to rear/to bring up (children)/fertility
to take a wife/to marry (a woman)
